scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an interior space. On the left, the Angel Gabriel, with large red and blue wings and a golden halo, kneels and presents a scroll inscribed with "Ave Maria gratia plena". He wears a green tunic and a reddish-brown cloak. To the right, the Virgin Mary, also with a golden halo, kneels in a blue robe, her hands clasped in prayer. Behind her is a bed canopy with red drapery. The background features a stone wall, a window with tracery, and an arched opening revealing a landscape. A lectern with an open book rests beside the Virgin.
